content: I've been thinking about getting a roof-mounted rack because I've got a smaller car and I don't want to sacrifice trunk space. I'm planning to take my road bike and mountain bike on the trip, and I'm not sure if a roof-mounted rack can handle the combined weight. Do you think a roof-mounted rack can handle both bikes, considering my road bike is a Trek Emonda and my mountain bike is a Specialized Rockhopper?
